title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Keep Your Agents Out of Trouble with Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (AIM3330)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 让您的代理远离麻烦 (AIM3330)
abstract: As AI agents take on complex real-world tasks, ensuring they act safely and responsibly is critical. In this session, learn how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore helps you build trustworthy agents through fine-grained policy enforcement, identity-aware authorization, and runtime isolation. See how these capabilities work together to prevent unauthorized actions, protect sensitive data, and secure agent-to-tool interactions—all with millisecond-latency policy controls and built-in observability. Walk away with practical patterns to make safety, governance, and compliance a native part of your agent architecture—so your agents consistently do the right thing, the right way.
abstract_cn: 随着AI代理承担复杂的现实世界任务,确保它们安全且负责任地行动至关重要。在本次会议中,了解Amazon Bedrock AgentCore如何通过细粒度策略执行、身份感知授权和运行时隔离帮助您构建可信赖的代理。了解这些功能如何协同工作以防止未经授权的操作、保护敏感数据并确保代理与工具交互的安全性——所有这些都具有毫秒级延迟的策略控制和内置可观测性。掌握实用模式,使安全性、治理和合规性成为代理架构的原生部分——让您的代理始终以正确的方式做正确的事。
